root.name: Theatre of Magic
root.description: OverviewTheatre of Magic is a PInball machine released by Midway (using the Bally name) in 1995. The playfield features a rotating trunk that is used in many of the game's modes. One side of the trunk allows players to shoot inside it, while another includes a vertical magnet used to capture balls for multiball. Other features include two ramps, a magna-save on the outlanes, a trapdoor in front of the right ramp, a captive ball target, and two loop shots. The game's modes revolve around performing various magical feats, including the Levitating Woman, the Tiger Saw, and the Trunk Escape. The playfield was designed by John Popadiuk.
